General.Name: Goertek Inc
General.Description: Goertek Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells electro-acoustic components, optical components, electronic accessories, and related products worldwide. The company offers smart wearable products, such as smart watches and bracelets; smart viewable products, including VR/AR HMD, viewable peripherals, and panoramic camera; hearables comprising TWS earphones, audio glasses, and headphones; voice-controlled speaker, unmanned aerial vehicle, and robotics products; and smart lights. It also provides components, which include speakers and receivers, antenna, and optical component modules; and various solutions. Goertek Inc. was founded in 2001 and is based in Weifang, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Mr. Junan  Jia
6.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
